name: NOT SPACE INVADERS (Juan Ignacio González)
description:
You're a ship in space, but a time vortex sends you to another dimesion, leaving you in a very dark version of the classic arcade game: Space Invaders.

This is a classic twin stick shooter bullet hell on the classic arcade game that tries to recreate the ruthless experience of Space Invaders but with a modern twist.

- A controller is required to play -

Thanks For Playing!

Controls:

-Left Stick: Move around the screen.

-Right Stick: Shoot in any direction.

-RB: Change Proyectiles, you can only hurt enemies with the same colour as your proyectile.

-LB: Slow down time.

Music Used:

- Energised from No more heroes.

- Pleather for breakfast from No more heroes: Travis Strikes Again.

- Rank Up from No more heroes 2: Desperate Struggle.

- Game Over from No more heroes

All music by Masafumi Takada
